scripts.typecheck:services: for dir in services/*/; do (cd "$dir" && [ -f tsconfig.json ] && echo "Type-checking $(basename $dir)..." && npm run build --if-present) || true; done
scripts.test:all: for dir in services/*/; do (cd "$dir" && [ -f package.json ] && echo "Testing $(basename $dir)..." && npm test --if-present) || true; done
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run typecheck && npm run check:architecture
